name: clearonline-monitoring
description: Find server locations that serve a given url

scripts.create-authorizer: claudia create --name clearonlineMonitoring --region us-east-1 --handler authorizer.handler --config claudia-auth.json --profile mars-the-bot
scripts.create-api: claudia create --name clearonlineMonitoringApi --region us-east-1 --api-module index --config claudia-api.json --profile mars-the-bot

author: Marcellin Nshimiyimana
